net.doo.snap.lib.detector

Class ContourDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.doo.snap.lib.detector.ContourDetector

  • public class ContourDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs contour detection.

      • detect

                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Tries to detect a polygon from the given image.
        Parameters:
        nv21 - NV21 encoded camera image
        width - Width of the image pixels
        height - Height of the image in pixels
        Returns:
        A DetectionResult that gives information about the recognition state.

        Tries to detect a polygon from the given image.
        Parameters:
        data - Encoded image (e.g. a JPEG)
        Returns:
        A DetectionResult that gives information about the recognition state.

        Returns:

      • processImage

        public final Bitmap processImage(byte[] nv21,
                                 int width,
                                 int height,
                                 java.util.List<Point> polygon,
                                 int imageFilter)
        Post processes an image, applying cropping and filters.
        Parameters:
        nv21 - NV21 encoded camera image
        width - Width of the image pixels
        height - Height of the image in pixels
        polygon - The detected polygon
        imageFilter - Image filter type, one of IMAGE_FILTER_* or 0.
        Returns:
        The processed Bitmap.

      • processImageF

        public final Bitmap processImageF(byte[] nv21,
                                  int width,
                                  int height,
                                  java.util.List<PointF> polygon,
                                  int imageFilter)
        Post processes an image (using floating point coordinates), applying cropping and filters.
        Parameters:
        nv21 - NV21 encoded camera image
        width - Width of the image pixels
        height - Height of the image in pixels
        polygon - The detected polygon
        imageFilter - Image filter type, one of IMAGE_FILTER_* or 0.
        Returns:
        The processed Bitmap.

        Parameters:

      • processImageAndScale

        public final Bitmap processImageAndScale(byte[] encodedImage,
                                         java.util.List<PointF> polygon,
                                         int imageFilter,
                                         int biggestSide)
        Post processes an image (using floating point coordinates), applying cropping and filters and then scales image to given size.
        Parameters:
        encodedImage - The image to process
        polygon - The detected polygon
        imageFilter - Image filter type, one of IMAGE_FILTER_* or 0.
        Returns:
        The processed Bitmap.

      • processImageAndRelease

        public final Bitmap processImageAndRelease(Bitmap bitmap,
                                           java.util.List<PointF> polygon,
                                           int imageFilter)
        Same as processImageF(java.lang.String, java.util.List<PointF>, int), but it recycles the input Bitmap before creating a new one in Java heap. This helps to reduce total memory footprint on Java side and therefore avoiding OutOfMemory errors.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The image to process. Will be recycled after this method completes.
        polygon - The detected polygon
        imageFilter - Image filter type, one of IMAGE_FILTER_* or 0.
        Returns:
        The processed Bitmap.

      • getPolygon

        public final java.util.List<Point> getPolygon()
        Returns:
        the detected polygon (if any) as absolute pixel coordinates.

      • getPolygonF

        public final java.util.List<PointF> getPolygonF()
        Returns:
        the detected polygon (if any) as floating point coordinates in [0.f, 1.f[.

      • getDetectionScore

        public final double getDetectionScore()
        Returns:
        the detection score (if any) as double value in [0.0, 100.0].

      • getVerticalLines

        public final java.util.List<Line2D> getVerticalLines()
        Returns:
        Detected vertical lines

      • getHorizontalLines

        public final java.util.List<Line2D> getHorizontalLines()
        Returns:
        Detected horizontal lines

      • setAcceptedAngleScore

        public final void setAcceptedAngleScore(double acceptedAngleScore)
        The minimum score in percent (0 - 100) of the perspective distortion to accept a detected document. Default is 75.0. Set lower values to accept more perspective distortion. Warning: Lower values result in more blurred document images.
        Parameters:
        acceptedAngleScore -

      • setAcceptedSizeScore

        public final void setAcceptedSizeScore(double acceptedSizeScore)
        The minimum size in percent (0 - 100) of the screen size to accept a detected document. It is sufficient that height or width match the score. Default is 80.0. Warning: Lower values result in low resolution document images.
        Parameters:
        acceptedSizeScore -

      • setRequiredAspectRatios

        public final void setRequiredAspectRatios(java.util.List<PageAspectRatio> requiredPageAspectRatios)
        Set required PageAspectRatios.
        Parameters:
        requiredPageAspectRatios -

      • setRectOfInterest

        Set rect od interest sizes.
        Parameters:
        rectOfInterest - RectF

      • resetPolygonHistory

        public final void resetPolygonHistory()
        Calling this method will reset the polygon smoothing history.

        Disposes the native resources held by this instance.

      • createBitmapFromNV21

        public static final Bitmap createBitmapFromNV21(byte[] nv21,
                                                int width,
                                                int height)
        Converts a NV21 encoded image into a ARGB_8888 Bitmap (using fixed point arithmetics).
        Parameters:
        nv21 - Bytes to decode.
        width - The width of the image.
        height - The height of the image.
        Returns:
        The decoded image as a Bitmap.
